posts.post_title: WTB T206 Walter Johnsons - both poses
posts.post_content:
Looking for T206 Walter Johnsons - either pose.  Specifically looking for backs that I don't have.  Raw or graded is fine, but probably looking for GD-VG.  Will consider lower as well.

Thanks!
